properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 4:06AM CST until February 6 at 8:46PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Village Creek At At Avenue W Affecting Jefferson County.

.Heavy rainfall of 2 to 3 inches has occurred since Midnight over
the Village Creek Basin...and a flood warning is now in effect for
Village Creek. Additional flood warnings are in effect for Jefferson
county. Additional rainfall of 1 to 2 inches may occur over the next
3 hours.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Village Creek At At Avenue W.
* until the warning is cancelled.
* At  3:45 AM Thursday The stage Was 10.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 10.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 12.1 feet by this
morning. The river will fall below flood stage this morning.
* Impact...At 12.5 feet...Residential flooding begins and evacuations
may become necessary. Persons in low-lying areas near the creek
should move to higher ground.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued later this morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
